snippet.title: Keanu Reeves on the 'Point Break' remake
snippet.description:
* Keanu Reeves has a love/hate relationship with fame. While promoting the independent film “Generation Um…,” Reeves told CNN, “You want to have privacy, but then you also want to be in the public.” “I don't necessarily correlate a paparazzi pi...
http://marquee.blogs.cnn.com/2013/04/23/keanu-reeves-on-the-point-break-remake/

snippet.title: Review: 'Street Kings' is all too by-the-book
snippet.description:
* In "Street Kings," Keanu Reeves' bad-boy cop Tom Ludlow may not play by the rules, but the film sure does.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/SHOWBIZ/Movies/04/11/review.street/index.html

snippet.title: Review: Weakly tapped 'Hardball'
snippet.description:
* So far this year, Keanu Reeves is two for two when it comes to bad film choices. The romantic comedy "Sweet November" crashed and burned in February, and now he's struck out again with "Hardball."
http://www.cnn.com/2001/SHOWBIZ/Movies/09/14/review.hardball/index.html

snippet.title: Review Your kids should pass on Air Bud Golden Receiver
snippet.description:
* CNN Youd think Hollywood would learn by now that you shouldnt make a sequel unless you can enlist the talents of the original films lead actor. First, Speed 2 tanks because Jason Patric couldnt fill Keanu Reeves shoes a frightening thought indeed, and now we get Air Bu...
http://www.cnn.com/SHOWBIZ/Movies/9808/19/review.air.bud/index.html

snippet.title: Home Video Preview
snippet.description:
* HOLLYWOOD, California CNN If you enjoyed director Alfonse Araus adaptation of the book Like Water for Chocolate, then reserve a copy of his first Englishlanguage film, A Walk in the Clouds. This sepiatinged romance stars Keanu Reeves, Giancarlo Gianini, and Anthony Qui...

snippet.title: Geoffrey Rush wants to be committed
snippet.description:
* Listen up, Nicolas Cage, Helen Hunt, Keanu Reeves, and any other hot Hollywood actor who can't seem to stop themselves from starring in movie after movie, no matter the quality of the project.
http://www.cnn.com/2001/SHOWBIZ/Movies/01/17/geoffrey.rush/index.html

snippet.title: Review: Heaven, hell and middling 'Constantine'
snippet.description:
* The title role of John Constantine in the new science fiction thriller "Constantine" is actually tailor-made for the limited talents of Keanu Reeves. His vacant "nobody's home" delivery is perfect for this antihero, a demon-hunter who is caught between heaven and hell.
http://www.cnn.com/2005/SHOWBIZ/Movies/02/18/review.constantine/index.html
